translations: n.[外科] 半脱位；不全脱位

phrs.translation: 半脱位, 不全脱位, 半位, 关节半脱位
晶体半脱位, 晶状体半脱位, 水晶体半脱位, 晶状体脱位
髌骨半脱位, 髌骨外翻
晶状体半脱位, 晶体半脱位, 晶状体不全脱位
脊椎半脱位复杂性症状, 大性症状

sentences.sentence: No statistically significant difference in occurrence of patellar instability and subluxation in both procedures.
sentences.translation: 术后髌骨不稳定和半脱位的发生率无统计学差异。

sentences.sentence: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of arytenoid subluxation (AS) following endotracheal intubation.
sentences.translation: 目的提高对气管插管后环杓关节半脱位(as)诊断和治疗的认识。

sentences.sentence: In type a, rotary subluxation occurs during progression of the curvature. In type b, it seems to be the initial event.
sentences.translation: 型患者旋转性半脱位出现在曲率增加过程中，而B型似乎初期即发生旋转性半脱位。
